input.sentences: got to work early in the morning and walked to the office .
looked out the window at the morning .
as the day went | it got hazy outside .
checked the internet connection before getting to work .
started actual work by printing some documents that came up in the copy room printer .
output.sentences: I knew I was in for a crappy day as I walked to my office that morning.
I looked out the window that morning hoping that a good view of the city would brighten my day.
Even that was crappy I noticed as I looked out and saw how hazy the day was.
I sat down to begin working and noticed I couldn't get online so I checked the internet connection.
While I was attempting to fix the internet connection, my printer started printing a ton of random documents without any prompts and I thought, when is this day going to end?
